name: Zardahi
description:
“Zardahi” is an adventure game and mental agility / puzzle game, in which there are three rooms set in three different famous series / movies. Each room has multiple objects that can be used by the player to solve the riddles, which need reasoning and logic to be completed. These themed rooms are:

- Game of Thrones

- Pirates of the Caribbean

- Star Wars

This project was maded by a group of 5 students in a period of 5 months. You can see more information about the project in my profiles of ArtStation and Instagram!

If you can't solve a certain puzzle or you get stuck in a room, remember that there's a complete gameplay of Zardahi on Youtube :)
